Package: com.github.tagc.semver.version

[Groovy] Class BaseVersion

    • com.github.tagc.semver.version.BaseVersion
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      Version

      @groovy.transform.Immutable
@groovy.transform.PackageScope
final class BaseVersion
extends java.lang.Object

      A concrete, base implementation of Version.

      Authors:
      davidfallah
      Since:
      v0.1.0

      • Nested Class Summary

          Nested classes 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static class  BaseVersion.Builder Version builder - allows for com.github.tagc.semver.Version construction parameters to be selected incrementally.
          static class  BaseVersion.Parser Version parser - parses strings and constructs BaseVersion instances from them.
